nodes.bodyText:
I don't think we want to change 14 at this point.  Based on my understanding, 15 is the earliest release we may have to change if the alternativeLibraryName doesn't work.
Let's remove the version check for the 0.21.0 release and address in the jdk15 release.  If the check is needed for 15 to build, then we can make it <= 14 for the time being

Agreed that JDK 14 should be same as JDK 11/8. JDK15 is the earliest release requiring the change as per #8941, otherwise following UnsatisfiedLinkError will be thrown during JDK 15 AIX build:
12:35:36  Exception in thread "main" java/lang/UnsatisfiedLinkError: sun/nio/fs/UnixNativeDispatcher.init()I
12:35:36  	at sun/nio/fs/UnixNativeDispatcher.<clinit> (java.base@9/UnixNativeDispatcher.java:654)
12:35:36  	at sun/nio/fs/UnixFileSystem.<init> (java.base@9/UnixFileSystem.java:65)

Making it <= 14 for the time being.
@DanHeidinga it is ready for another look.
